task_description: Investigate and implement UI distinction between reviewer agents and phase work agents in the dashboard

phases.name: Investigation
phases.description: Analyze current dashboard code and agent data structure to understand how to distinguish reviewers

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Add visual distinction for reviewer agents in the UI
